Resize Sensor

Use CSS-Element-Queries Polyfill to support dynamic resizing of the component.

Dependency

css-element-queries

Usage

angular.module('myApp', ['gantt', 'gantt.resizeSensor']);

<div gantt>
  <gantt-resize-sensor enabled="...">
  </gantt-resize-sensor>
</div>

Attributes

  • enabled

    Enable resize sensor using css-element-queries.

    default: true
